sourcesContent:
import React, { memo } from 'react'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { Grid, Skeleton } from '../../../components'
import Card from './Card'


function Board ({ data }) {
    const { cases, todayDeaths, recovered, deaths, todayCases } = data

    const getValue = (value) => value ? value : <Skeleton variant="text" width={182} />

    return (
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card value={getValue(cases)} label="Total de Casos" color="#5d78ff" />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card value={getValue(todayDeaths)} label="Ã“bitos Hoje" color="#f7b829" />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card value={getValue(todayCases)} label="Casos Hoje" color="#e95078" />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card value={getValue(deaths)} label="Total de Mortos" color="#000" />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card value={getValue(recovered)} label="Total de Recuperados" color="#67c887" />
        </Grid>
    </Grid>

    
    )  
}

export default memo(Board)
